name: Jamna Gleamsilver
skills: Acrobatics +5, Deception +3, Insight +2, Perception +4, Persuasion +3, Stealth +7

special_abilities.name: Cunning Action.
descriptions: Jamna can take a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

special_abilities.name: Gnome Cunning.
descriptions: Jamna has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma saving throws against magic.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: Jamna is a 4th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as her spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). Jamna has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list.

descriptions.raw: * Cantrips (at will): mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, ray of frost
descriptions.hyperlinked: * Cantrips (at will): mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, ray of frost

descriptions.raw: * 1st level (3 slots): charm person, color spray, disguise self, longstrider
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 1st level (3 slots): charm person, color spray, disguise self, longstrider

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: Jamna attacks twice with her shortswords.

actions.name: Shortsword.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 9 (1d6 + 3) plus (1d6) piercing damage if the target is Medium or larger.
